profile_audio::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Record your character getting ready to start the process.
profile_audio::text_card_0::text: Focus on the sounds necessary to illustrate the process. You don't need everything, just enough steps to show the progression from beginning to end.
profile_audio::clip_card_7::goals[0]: Conclude the story, tell us how it ended.
profile_audio::clip_card_7::goals[1]: Record your character concluding the process.
profile_audio::clip_card_3::goals[0]: Record your character at the next significant step in the process.
profile_audio::clip_card_6::goals[0]: Record your character completing the process.
profile_audio::title: Profile Process
profile_audio::clip_card_2::goals[0]: Record sound of where the process is taking place.
profile_audio::clip_card_5::goals[0]: If the process has an audience, record their reaction.
profile_audio::clip_card_1::goals[0]: Record the very beginning or first step of the process.
profile_audio::clip_card_4::goals[0]: Record sound that tells the audience what is happening.
profile_audio::text_card_1::text: Record different kinds of sound - the character explaining, sounds that indicate changes or unique steps in the process.
